thread.section_title: Kiddies Kingdom Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiddies Kingdom | www.kiddies-kingdom.com | 2 of 116
thread.title: jenny davenport
thread.title_full: Kiddies Kingdom reviewed by jenny davenport

author: jenny davenport
title: jenny davenport
text: My pram came in really good time considering it was free delivery which can take longer. My pram (Joie litetrax 4) is perfect and as described on the website. The service from kiddies kingdom was really good, I received regular emails and texts letting me know the status of my order once it had been processed, and on the morning of delivery I got a text letting me know the time of my delivery. The only criticism I have is that there is no option to track your delivery yourself as far as I could tell. This would have been handy but wouldn't stop me Ordering from here again.
